DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine drug motexafin gadolinium effective treatment patient relapse refractory multiple myeloma .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Motexafin Gadolinium Treatment Relapsed Refractory Multiple Myeloma
DOC.criteria: Relapsed Refractory Multiple Myeloma ≥ 18 year old Able provide consent participation ECOG status 02 Lab value : ANC ≥ 1,000/µL WBC count ≥ 2.0/µL Hemoglobin ≥ 8.0 g/dL Platelet count ≥ 50,000/µL AST ALT ≤ 2 x ULN Total Bilirubin ≤ 2 x ULN Creatinine ≤ 2.0 mg/dL Not pregnant lactating
